description:
This is a very interesting course for travelers. tourists and students who would like to know how to make basic conversations in Finnish.

  • Here you will learn how to greet people in all various occasions, Christmas, Easter, Valentine, ..etc.
  • Also you will learn how to introduce yourself & respond to others introducing themselves in Finnish.
  • This course is structured in a very logical way that helps students go from scratch from basic informal greetings, to seasonal greetings till asking people where are they from!

This should take you one hour of watching the lessons and 3 additional hours interacting with the materials and perhaps practice with a partner.
title: Finnish Language - Introductory Course I
instructors: Dr. Tharwat Wasfy, Teaching Finnish Tea Hirvikoski
